result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for providing client implementations and data models for interacting with Solana blockchain services via the Moralis API.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating client logic and data models in separate files for better maintainability and separation of concerns.

internal/infras/moralis_solana/client.go.purpose: Client implementation for interacting with Solana blockchain services.

internal/infras/moralis_solana/models.go.purpose: Defines data models for interacting with the Moralis Solana API.
